b'@Plessiez $NMM is my top #drybulk pick and the one that I continue to add to.  Bought a lot more today. But not a pure play as they will own many container ships with $NMCI acquisition. Favorite pure plays are $SBLK and $GOGL. $GOGL is the better buy at today\xe2\x80\x99s price.'

b'Guess how RECORD grain exports get from the US to China?  A very long voyage on a #Drybulk ship through the Panama Canal.  Record volumes + Panama Canal Delays = high shipping rates.  $NMM $SBLK $GOGL so cheap. https://t.co/F6ahl6duot'
